title: Gorgeous young mom found in nightgown in her own bed, AXE embedded in her forehead. Tot girl in room next door.
itunes:title: Gorgeous young mom found in nightgown in her own bed, AXE embedded in her forehead. Tot girl in room next door.
description:
A retired business executive has been arrested for the 1982 murder of his wife. Police say James Krauseneck used an axe to hack his sleeping wife, Cathleen, in the forehead. He then leaves his toddler daughter alone in their house all day with her dead mommy, police say.

The case stumped police for nearly four decades.

Joining Nancy Grace to discuss the case:

  • Kathleen Murphy: Family attorney
  • Cloyd Steiger: 36 years with Seattle Police Department, 22-year homicide detective & author of "Seattle's Forgotten Serial Killer: Gary Gene Grant"
  • Dr. Bethany Marshall: Psychoanalyst, Beverly Hills
  • Dr. Michelle Dupre: South Carolina Medical Examiner & author of “Homicide Investigation Field Guide”
  • Nancy Monaghan: Reporter for Democrat & Chronicle (retired) & co-author of upcoming book on the Krauseneck murder 


Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
